GET /accounts/{account_id}/iam/user_grou.description: List all the user groups for an account.

parameters.description: ID of the user group to be fetched.
parameters.name: id

schema.description: Name of the user group to be fetched.
A string used for searching for user groups containing that substring.
Maximum number of results per page.
The sort order of returned user groups by name. Default sort order is ascending. To switch to descending, set this parameter to "desc"
